author: gtrasuk
msg: Removed examples folder, as discussed on the mailing list.  Added pointer to the new River Examples project.

author: gtrasuk
msg: There was a document in the qa/docs folder called 'qaarch.sdw' which describes the architecture of the QA test suite.  It was in the archaic "StarOffice Writer" format.  It is now replaced with the file 'qaarch.odt', which has been converted to Apache Open Office document format, hence is readable with contemporary software.
